titlestmt.titleproper: Rosove (Michael H.) collection of South with Scott editions by E.R.G.R. Evans
Finding Aid for the Michael H. Rosove Collection of South with Scott editions by E.R.G.R. Evans LSC.2313
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Kelly Besser, 2021.

p.date: Online finding aid last updated 2021 January 11.

address.addressline: Room A1713, Charles E. Young Research Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-06-18 14:39:31 -0700.

did.unittitle: Michael H. Rosove collection of South with Scott editions

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. All requests to access special collections materials must be made in advance using the request button located on this page.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Property rights to the physical objects belong to UCLA Library Special Collections. All other rights, including copyright, are retained by the creators and their heirs. It is the responsibility of the researcher to determine who holds the copyright and pursue the copyright owner or his or her heir for permission to publish where The UC Regents do not hold the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Michael H. Rosove Collection of South with Scott editions by E.R.G.R. Evans (Collection 2313). UCLA Library Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, University of California, Los Angeles.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collections are processed to a variety of levels depending on the work necessary to make them usable, their perceived user interest and research value, availability of staff and resources, and competing priorities. Library Special Collections provides a standard level of preservation and access for all collections and, when time and resources permit, conducts more intensive processing. These materials have been arranged and described according to national and local standards and best practices.

We are committed to providing ethical, inclusive, and anti-racist description of the materials we steward, and to remediating existing description of our materials that contains language that may be offensive or cause harm. We invite you to submit feedback about how our collections are described, and how they could be described more accurately, by filling out the form located on our website: Report Problematic Content and Description in UCLA's Library Collections and Archives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of 80 editions of Edward R. G. R. Evans's work, titled South with Scott, collected by Dr. Michael H. Rosove for his bibliography titled Antarctica, 1772-1922 (Freestanding Publications through 1999 (Adélie Books, 2001) and Supplement to the Rosove Antarctic Bibliography (Adélie Books, 2007).

odd.head: How to Find Titles in this Collection
odd.p: Titles in this collection have been individually cataloged and can be discovered in the Library catalog by searching this author string, Rosove, Michael H., 1948- former owner.
